summary: A woman is murdered, but she is seen in different ways by different people.
cast: Jean Kent|Dirk Bogarde|John McCallum|Susan Shaw|Hermione Baddeley|Charles Victor|Duncan Macrae|Lana Morris|Joe Linnane|Vida Hope|John Boxer|Albert Chevalier|Julian D'Albie|Anthony Dawson|Richard Dunn|Ian Fleming|Nora Gordon|Helen Goss|Everley Gregg|Duncan Lamont|Tom Macaulay|John Martin|Josephine Middleton|Richard Pearson|Robert Scroggins|Jack Sharp|Merle Tottenham
title: The Woman in Question
